title: Team-Based Learning Simulation for Strengthening Civic Collaboration Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Basic societal issue comprehension and digital device utilization skills
context.additional_context: A course providing experiential learning in solving community issues through smartphone-centered VR simulations

learning_goals: Learners can apply team-based decision-making processes in simulation environments with over 80% accuracy
Learners incorporate peer evaluation feedback into improvements at over 70% implementation rates across three or more team activities within four weeks
Learners achieve 85+ points (out of 100) on final simulation assessments to demonstrate community problem-solving competencies

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
